about.title: About Me
about.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer who thrives on exploring cutting-edge open source technologies with vibrant communities. Currently pursuing my Computer Science degree while working at Deutsche Telekom, I'm diving deep into Go while leveraging my strong Python foundation. I'm drawn to tools like Deno and Svelte because of their innovative approaches and active developer ecosystems

job1.title: Dual Student Computer Science
description: Extended backend unit test coverage for improved testability and maintainability
Evaluated and introduced E2E testing framework (Playwright) with automated test implementation
Agile development using Scrum methodology and modern DevOps practices (CI/CD, containerization)

edu1.title: B.Sc. Computer Science - Dual Program
description: Focus areas: Embedded Systems, Operating Systems, Compiler Construction

edu2.title: B.Sc. Applied Computer Science
